intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At LeadWise, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

dataCollection.content: We may collect the following types of information:
types: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details you provide.
Business Information: Company name, industry, and information about your business needs.
Usage Data: Information about how you use our system, including access patterns and activities.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical data.

dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
purposes: To provide and improve our services.
To communicate with you regarding services, updates, and relevant information.
To manage your account and subscriptions.
To analyze and improve user experience.
To send marketing materials (only with your consent).
To comply with legal requirements and protect our rights.

parties: Service Providers: Companies that help us operate our services (hosting, data analysis, payment services).
Business Partners: Only when you have given explicit consent.
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights.
dataSharing.note: Any third party we work with is obligated to protect your information according to high standards.

dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, misuse, or loss. However, no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure.

Correction: Request to correct inaccurate or incomplete information.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you wanted to know about LeadWise

items.question: How long does it take to set up the system?
items.answer: The setup process takes between 7-14 business days. This includes a strategy session, script writing, technical integration, CRM setup, and comprehensive training.

items.question: What do I need for the system to work?
items.answer: You need a business WhatsApp number, a Cal.com or Google Calendar account, and of course - leads coming to your website or forms. We handle everything else for you.

items.question: Is there a monthly cost?
items.answer: The initial investment is a one-time payment of $799. After that, there's a small monthly fee for technical tools (around $50-80/month) - depending on usage volume.

items.question: Is the system suitable for any type of business?
items.answer: The system is especially suitable for meeting-based businesses - consultants, service firms, salespeople, agents, and more. If you're based on calls or meetings with clients - this system is perfect for you.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: In the first meeting, we check compatibility. If the system doesn't fit you - we simply don't proceed. But if we start working - we're committed to your success.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
items.answer: Not at all! The system is installed for you from A to Z. You receive simple and convenient training, and all routine operation is simple and easy.

items.question: How many leads do I need per month?
items.answer: The system can handle any number of leads - from 10 leads per month to hundreds. It's built according to your volume.

items.question: I have more questions, how do I contact you?
items.answer: The easiest way - click the 'Schedule Your Free Strategy Session' button and let's schedule a short call. We'll answer all questions and check together if the system fits you.
